Emerald Suit Shoes (Male)
kDesc
I mean who doesn't love the colour of money comfortably placed around their feet. [#Legal]
Qui n'aimerait pas avoir des chaussures dont la couleur est associée à l'espoir ? [#Legal]
Wer trägt nicht gern die Farbe der Hoffnung an den Füßen? [#Legal]
Insomma, a chi non piace avere i piedi avvolti dal colore dei dollari? [#Legal]
¿A quién no le gusta el color del dinero rodeando con sutileza sus pies? [#Legal]
돈을 상징하는 녹색의 구두가 당신의 발을 감싸고 있습니다. [#Legal]
I mean who doesn't love the color of money comfortably placed around their feet. [#Legal]
我的意思是，有誰不喜歡金錢的顏色舒適地包裹著雙腳。 [#Legal]
我的意思是，有誰不喜歡金錢的顏色舒適地包裹著雙腳。 [#Legal]
I mean who doesn't love the color of money comfortably placed around their feet. [#Legal]
